title: Market share of leading global payment card manufacturers 2016
summary: In 2016 , Gemalto_(Netherlands) share accounted for the largest share of Market leading manufacturers Giesecke_&_Devrient_(Germany) , with a 15.6 % share .
9.5 % of the company leading Market Giesecke_&_Devrient_(Germany) was made through Oberthur_(France) share that year .

Oberthur_(France) share setting the pace strong growth of Market leading Oberthur_(France) segment – rising seven percent since – has contributed towards the shrinking share of its Gemalto_(Netherlands) Manufactor .
gold: This statistic presents the market share of leading of leading payment card manufacturers worldwide in 2016 . Gemalto , a company headquartered in the Netherlands , led the ranking in 2016 , with a market share of 15.6 percent .
